traits.description: Timmy disfruta de la sensación de libertad que resulta de estar completamente desnudPAWN_gender ? o : a. Puede soportar la ropa, pero será más feliz si no trae nada.
traits.name: nudista

traits.description: Timmy se apresura a hacer daño a la gente y no le importa ver sangre o muerte. Es cuatro veces más probable que empiece una pelea.
traits.name: sanguinario

traits.description: Timmy es una persona excepcionalmente agradable y generosa. él nunca insulta a los demás y a veces ofrece palabras amables para alegrar el ánimo de los que le rodean. Tampoco juzga a las personas por su aspecto. Su simpatía también le hace más proclive a conformarse con las opiniones predominantes.
stats: x200% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x200% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: amable

traits.description: Timmy no tiene empatía. El sufrimiento de los demás no le molesta en lo más mínimo. A él no le importa que otras personas sean descuartizadas, se les deje sin enterrar, se les encarcele o que sean vendidas a la esclavitud, a no ser que lo afecte directamente. él no podrá mejorar su humor socializando con la gente.
stats: x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: psicópata

traits.description: A Timmy le enseñaron que comer carne humana está mal y es algo horrible. Pero una vez, hace mucho tiempo, él la probó... y le gustó.
traits.name: caníbal

traits.description: Timmy siempre dice exactamente lo que le pasa por la cabeza, especialmente si es algo que lo molesta. Y eso tiende a irritar a la gente.
stats: x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: intratable

traits.description: La inteligencia de Timmy es demasiado elevada para su propio bien. él aprende cualquier cosa mucho más rápido que todos los demás, pero puede comportarse de forma excéntrica.
stats: x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: demasiadolisto

traits.description: A Timmy le encanta pelear cara a cara. Su puntería aumenta significativamente durante el combate cuerpo a cuerpo, pero él se enfadará bastante si se le pide que lleve un arma a distancia.
stats: +4.0 prob. de golpe cuerpo a cuerpo
+4.0 prob. de golpe cuerpo a cuerpo

traits.name: luchador

traits.description: Timmy encuentra algo emocionante en ser heridPAWN_gender ? o : a. él no sabe por qué, su cerebro está programado de manera diferente.
traits.name: masoquista

traits.description:
A Timmy le gusta estar despiertPAWN_gender ? o : a durante la noche, y dormir durante el día.

 recibe un bono de humor si se despierta por la noche (23h-6h) y una pérdida de humor si se despierta durante el día (11h-18h).

No sufre de penalización de humor por estar en la oscuridad.
traits.name: nocturno

traits.description: Timmy necesita un dormitorio realmente impresionante. Pierde humor si no consigue lo que quiere.
traits.name: codicioso

traits.description: Para Timmy es degradante tener un dormitorio menos impresionante que el de alguien más. él pierde humor si algún colono tiene un dormitorio más impresionante.
traits.name: celoso

traits.description: Timmy ha renunciado a las comodidades físicas y a los placeres en favor de un estilo de vida simple y puro. él será infeliz si tiene un dormitorio demasiado impresionante. A él también le disgusta la comida elegante y prefiere comer su comida cruda. Nunca juzga a los demás por su apariencia.
stats: x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: austero

traits.description: A Timmy le atrae la gente de su mismo sexo.
traits.name: homosexual

traits.description: Timmy se siente románticamente atraídPAWN_gender ? o : a tanto por hombres como por mujeres.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy no tiene ninguna atracción sexual hacia nadie en absoluto.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: La voz de Timmy tiene una cualidad aguda y nasal terriblemente incómoda al oído humano. Esto predispone a los demás contra él.
traits.name: vozchillona

traits.description: Timmy tiene una respiración muy sonora y profunda todo el tiempo. Además, siempre está sudando. Los demás se sienten incómodos a su alrededor.
traits.name: respiraciónespeluznante

traits.description: Timmy ama el fuego. Nunca apagará los incendios. Para aliviar el estrés, ocasionalmente encenderá fuego al azar. Esto sucede más a menudo si su humor es bajo.
traits.name: pirómano

traits.description: Timmy es débil y cobarde. Incluso un poco de dolor lo inmovilizará.
stats: x200% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x200% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: cobarde

traits.description: Timmy tiene una remarcable inteligencia cinestésica. él parece bailar alrededor del peligro con una gracia preternatural.
stats: x10% prob. de activación de trampa
x10% prob. de activación de trampa

traits.name: ágil

traits.description: Timmy tiene un don para aprender. él capta las cosas mucho más rápido que otros.
traits.name: aprendizrápido

traits.description: Timmy es lentPAWN_gender ? o : a en la captación. Aprende mucho más lento que otros.
stats: x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: aprendizlento

traits.description: Timmy no necesita estar al aire libre. él nunca se sentirá encerradPAWN_gender ? o : a ni tendrá claustrofobia, no importa cuánto tiempo se quede adentro y no le molesta la oscuridad.
traits.name: subterráneo

traits.description: Se siente limitadPAWN_gender ? o : a en su débil cuerpo humano. A menudo sueña con ser mejoradPAWN_gender ? o : a con partes del cuerpo artificiales.
traits.name: modificadordelcuerpo

traits.description: Timmy cree que el cuerpo humano está limitado por una razón. Para él, las partes artificiales del cuerpo son poco éticas y repugnantes.
traits.name: puristacorporal

traits.description: Timmy realmente odia y desconfía de los hombres.
traits.name: misándrico

traits.description: Timmy realmente odia y desconfía de las mujeres.
traits.name: misógino

traits.description: Timmy tiene una memoria fantástica para los detalles. él perderá habilidades no utilizadas a la mitad del ritmo de otras personas.
traits.name: granmemoria

traits.description: Timmy tiene piel gruesa, carne densa y huesos fuertes. él recibe mucho menos daño que otras personas por los mismos golpes. él es extremadamente difícil de matar.
traits.name: resistente

traits.description: Timmy se siente alienadPAWN_gender ? o : a e incomprendidPAWN_gender ? o : a por otros seres humanos. él tendrá una constante perdida de humor, pero tendrá una probabilidad del (50%) de obtener una inspiración creativa después de sufrir un colapso mental.
traits.name: artistatorturado

traits.description: La vida de Timmy gira en torno a la comida. Le entra hambre rápidamente, y de vez en cuando se ve superadPAWN_gender ? o : a por el impulso de comer vorazmente, incluso cuando no tiene hambre.
traits.name: glotón

traits.description: Timmy no necesita dormir tanto como una persona normal. Si él está durmiendo en una cama o en el suelo, estará completamente descansadPAWN_gender ? o : a en dos tercios del tiempo habitual.
stats: +50% multi. de la tasa de reposo
+50% multi. de la tasa de reposo

traits.name: sueñorápido

traits.description: Timmy siempre se queda atrás cada vez que viaja en grupo.
traits.name: pausado

traits.description: A Timmy le gusta llegar a los sitios rápido. él camina más rápido que el resto de la gente.
traits.name: conprisa

traits.description: Timmy siempre se mueve como si tuviera prisa, tan deprisa que normalmente deja atrás a todos los demás.
traits.name: trotador

traits.description: Timmy tiene una fascinación intensa por los químicos recreativos. El consumo de drogas recreativas mejorará el humor, mientras que la abstención conducirá a una creciente frustración a lo largo del tiempo y posiblemente a borracheras de drogas. Ignorará las directivas de no usar drogas recreativas, y consumirá más que una persona normal.
traits.name: fascinaciónporlosquímicos

traits.description: Timmy tiene un interés por los químicos recreativos. El consumo de drogas recreativas mejorará el humor, mientras que la abstención conducirá a una creciente frustración a lo largo del tiempo y posiblemente a borracheras de drogas. Ignorará las directivas de no usar drogas recreativas, y consumirá más que una persona normal.
traits.name: interésporlosquímicos

traits.description: Timmy aborrece la idea de consumir cualquier sustancia con fines recreativos y se abstiene de consumir alcohol o drogas.
stats: Euforia por drogas mental state disabled.
Euforia extrema por drogas mental state disabled.
Euforia por drogas mental state disabled.
Euforia extrema por drogas mental state disabled.

traits.name: abstemio

traits.description: Timmy considera alentadora cualquier situación, siempre, sin importarle cuál sea.
traits.name: confiado

traits.description: Timmy tiene una inclinación natural hacia el optimismo. Es difícil entristecerlo.
traits.name: optimista

traits.description: Timmy suele centrarse en el lado negativo de las cosas.
traits.name: pesimista

traits.description: Timmy siempre es infeliz. él tiene problemas para mantenerse de buen humor, incluso cuando todo le va bien.
traits.name: depresivo

traits.description: La determinación de Timmy está protegida por un escudo de hierro. él sigue adelante a pesar de cualquier contratiempo, incluso los que harían rendirse a cualquier otro.
stats: x25% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x25% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: voluntaddehierro

traits.description: Timmy tiene una estabilidad mental firme, no se quebrará bajo las situaciones de estrés que quebrarían a la mayoría de personas.
stats: x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x50% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: resuelto

traits.description: Timmy tiende a flaquear al ser sometidPAWN_gender ? o : a a presión.
stats: x200% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x200% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: nervioso

traits.description: Timmy está continuamente a punto de estallar ante una situación problemática. él es quien primero se quiebra ante una situación difícil.
stats: x300% factor de pérdida de certeza global
x300% factor de pérdida de certeza global

traits.name: inestable

traits.description: A Timmy le gusta que todo esté siempre en su sitio. Trabajará más que la mayoría de las personas para conseguir que las cosas estén como él quiere. Pero en ocasiones, sus nervios lo derrotan.
traits.name: neurótico

traits.description: Timmy no para de estresarse con todas las cosas que hay por hacer. Trabajará como un animal para que las cosas estén como él quiere. Pero sus nervios pueden facilmente derrotarlo.
traits.name: muyneurótico

traits.description: A Timmy le parece fácil mantenerse concentradPAWN_gender ? o : a en el trabajo y hacer las cosas más rápido que a la mayoría.
traits.name: diligente

traits.description: Timmy es PAWN_gender ? un trabajador nato : una trabajadora nata. Terminará cualquier tarea mucho antes que los demás.
traits.name: muytrabajador

traits.description: Timmy es un poco flojPAWN_gender ? o : a.
traits.name: haragán

traits.description: A Timmy le encanta estar sin hacer nada y odia cualquier cosa productiva. Se mueve despacio y rara vez se puede centrar en una sola tarea.
traits.name: perezoso

traits.description: La mente de Timmy podría usarse como un diapasón psíquico. él es extremadamene sensible a fenomenos psíquicos.
traits.name: hipersensibilidadpsíquica

traits.description: La mente de Timmy es inusualmente sensible a fenómenos psíquicos.
traits.name: sensibilidadpsíquica

traits.description: La mente de Timmy está desafinada psíquicamente en comparación con la mayoría de las personas. Los fenómenos psíquicos no le afectarán tanto como a los demás.
traits.name: entumecimientopsíquico

traits.description: La mente de Timmy utiliza una frecuencia psíquica diferente a la de los demás. Los fenomenos psíquicos simplemente no le afectan.
traits.name: sorderapsíquica

traits.description: La puntería de Timmy es excelente, pero él necesita más tiempo para apuntar a su blanco.
traits.name: tiradorcuidadoso

traits.description: ¡Pum, pum, pum! A Timmy le encanta apretar el gatillo. Dispara mucho más rápido que los demás pero con menos precisión.
traits.name: gatilloalegre

traits.description: Timmy es excepcionalmente hermosPAWN_gender ? o : a, con una estructura facial exótica pero a la vez familiar y una mirada paralizante. La gente se siente atraída a él aunque él ni siquiera haya abierto la boca.
traits.name: hermoso

traits.description: Timmy tiene un bello rostro, lo cual predispone a la gente a gustar de él.
traits.name: guapo

traits.description: Timmy es algo fePAWN_gender ? o : a. Esto repele sutilmente a los demás durante las interacciones sociales.
traits.name: feo

traits.description: Timmy es increíblemente horrible. Su cara parece una mezcla entre un dibujo hecho por un niño poco talentoso, un feto malforme en un jarrón de formaldehído y una pieza de arte moderno. Los demás tienen que hacer un esfuerzo consciente para mirarlo a la cara mientras habla.
traits.name: fealdadextrema

traits.description: Timmy tiene un sistema inmunológico naturalmente poderoso. Obtendrá inmunidad mucho más rápido de lo que lo haría una persona normal, y puede sobrevivir a enfermedades que matarían a otros.
traits.name: superimmune

traits.description: Timmy tiene un sistema inmunológico horrible. Se enferma con más frecuencia de lo normal, con frecuencia con enfermedades que nadie en la colonia ha padecido.
traits.name: enfermizo

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description: Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description: Timmy disfruta de la soledad y la tranquilidad inherentes de largas sesiones de pesca. él prefiere pescar antes que hacer otras actividades.
traits.name: pescador

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: Timmy is an ally who will one day join your faction.
traits.name: (reunion)ally

traits.description: Timmy is a biotic god.
traits.name: bioticgod

traits.description: Timmy’s biotic capabilities are significantly dampened by past trauma, or simply the lack of predisposition.
traits.name: bioticallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy has not yet unlocked their full biotic potential, and most likely never will.
traits.name: bioticallydull

traits.description: Timmy’s biotic skills are greatly above average, allowing them to use the power without any fear of migraines or discomfort.
traits.name: bioticallyskilled

traits.description: Timmy’s biotic skills are known far and wide across the galaxy due to their talent and rare predisposition.
traits.name: bioticallytalented

traits.description: Timmy is a Demon of the Night Winds.
traits.name: ardatyakshi

traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in su work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and él will try to hide or run as a first priority.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. él will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in su life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to lo.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. él will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for lo.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. él will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. él feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. él feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. él treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
stats: +20% factor de éxito de la cirugía
+20% factor de éxito de la cirugía

traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. él absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. él absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. él is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. su bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and él will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
traits.name: straight

traits.description: Timmy will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
traits.name: faithful

traits.description: Timmy just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
traits.name: philanderer

traits.description: Timmy prefers romantic relationships involving multiple partners to monogamous relationships. él doesn't mind if su partners romance other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
traits.name: polyamorous

races.description: Un humano estándar. No modificado por la ingeniería genética ni por cambios evolutivos.
races.name: humano

races.description:
A race of humanlike robots which are mostly female in model variety.

The origins of these machines are mostly unknown. Some speculate they are escapees from a civilization which used them for labor and some just suggest they are outdated pleasure machines which got dumped by a passing space freighter.

By design by their previous masters they are weak physically but their raw fortitude is enough to make up for it. Beware of their biological reactor and capacitors violently exploding, if they die by overheating.
races.name: android

races.description:
A race of rudimentary humanlike worker robots.

Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got a resident tinkerer.

Not capable of sapience, however their relative cheap cost and ability to work around the clock make them valuable workers.
races.name: droidwork

races.description:
A race of rudimentary humanlike warrior robots.

Usually found guarding the homes of the wealthy and offices of mega corporations. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers.
races.name: droidebatalla

races.description: Elegant mono-gender race. Native to the planet Thessia, Asari are often considered the most influential and respected sentient species in the galaxy, and are known for their, diplomacy and biotic aptitude. Asari can often use biotic powers without the need of biotic amplifiers.
races.name: asari

races.description: An omnivorous, reptile-like race that was rescued from their dying homeworld by the hanar. Since then, the drell have remained loyal to them for their camaraderie and have fit comfortably into galactic civilization. Their culture allows Drell to separate their mind from their body, helping them through hard times and work. They are predisposed to Kepral's syndrome, a lethal condition which can develop if Drell stays in cold temperatures too long.
races.name: drell

stats: +9.60 Tasa de recuperación del calor neural

races.description:
The Naga are a technologically advanced race without a functional goverment or law enforcement since their homeworld has become inhabitable.  This means they can be found mostly on space stations and ships and occassionally on Rimworlds as well.

They tend to work as mercenaries for the highest bidder and offer their superior skills with guns. Not just as excellent shooters, but also as weapon manufacturers. Their plasma technology is only rivaled by the charge weapons of glitterworlds. Naga are also known for their regenerative abilities and proficiency at disassembling mechanoids.

Despite this their way of life does not go well with others and thus they struggle to find allies among other races.

Good at: Shooting, Butchering, Mechanoid Disassembly, Psychics, Quality Crafting/Construction
Bad at: Melee, Plants, Animals, Enduring Pain
races.name: naga

stats: +5.0 Prob. de golpe cuerpo a cuerpo

races.description:
A dangerous, bloodlusty race of humanoid avians. Harpies constantly fight among themselves, hindering any major progress among their own. Their overwhelming bloodlust is hard to satisfy, but that also means they are naturally born fighters. Their razor-sharp claws and deadly lightning attacks make them a formidable foe, even if unarmed - not that harpies can wield weapons effectively.

Good at: Melee, Ranged without weapon, Enduring Pain, Running, Flying, Looking beautiful
Bad at: Using weapons (they can't), Carrying, Not constantly fighting
races.name: harpy

stats: +5.0 Prob. de golpe cuerpo a cuerpo

races.description:
A large, graceful humanoid creature, with long white fur, a large sharp horn and short simple tail. Their striking resemblance to Thrumbos gave them their name and leaves no doubt to where this race might have originated from.

While generally peaceful they make excellent melee fighters, thanks to their resilent hide and razor sharp horn. Thrumkin live in harmony with nature and know more about plants and animals than most advanced cultures, at least on the planet they are living on.

They are not particularly skilled when it comes to building tools and using them, neither are their structures more than simple protection from the elements.

Good at: Melee, Plants, Animals, General Labor, Absorbing Damage
Bad at: Shooting, Quality Crafting/Construction, Drug Production, Research, Trading, Cooking, Not eating your entire supplies of food
races.name: thrumkin
